titles.title: Great God, We Sing Your Guiding Hand

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: By day, by night, at home, abroad, still are we guarded by our God; by his incessant bounty fed, by his unerring counsel led.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: With grateful hearts the past we own; the future, all to us unknown, we to thy guardian care commit, and peaceful leave before thy feet.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: In scenes exalted or depressed, thou art our joy, and thou our rest; thy goodness all our hopes shall raise, adored through all our changing days.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: When death shall interrupt these songs, and seal in silence mortal tongues, our helper God, in whom we trust, shall keep our souls and guard our dust.
